metadata.Title: CVE-2023-5226 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description: An issue has been discovered in GitLab affecting all versions before16.4.3, all versions starting from 16.5 before 16.5.3, all versionsstarting from 16.6 before 16.6.1. Under certain circumstances, a maliciousactor bypass prohibited branch checks using a specially crafted branch nameto manipulate repository content in the UI.

criterions.comment: gitlab: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
